name: Penny market
short_description:
Penny Market is a learning tool totally based on Stock Market. This is web based tool or sort of game which teaches us complete core- concept of Stock Market only with Virtual Money. Using blend of PhP, Javascript, HTML, Css Penny Market come to Live. 

  Elegant but yet innovative design delivers it magnificent real time environment to the Users. Real-Time updation with graphs, pie- charts, and also Bar- graphs which can  be fully customizable by user. 

Supports IOS, Android, Symbian, Windows Mobile Environment Ohh Yes!!! it's true this tool will be available on every Mobile of the World with same user experience.................
summary: Penny Market is a tool which is totally based on Stock Market .
